item.title: iPhone 16 Drives Apple's India Sales Despite Sixth Place Ranking
item.description: Apple took sixth place in India’s smartphone market during the second quarter of the year, according to new data from Canalys. The country’s overall market rebounded with 7% year-over-year growth, rea
